scripts.triggerAllTests-webdriveruni-dashboard: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/webdriver-uni/* --record key 94a368e6-d979-4d2f-94f9-a4345461a20c --parallel --browser chrome --headed
scripts.triggerAllTests-autostore-dashboard: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/automation-testing-store/* --record key 94a368e6-d979-4d2f-94f9-a4345461a20c --parallel --browser chrome --headed
scripts.mochawesome-merge: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cypress-regression-pack: npm run delete-results && npm run rm -rf mochawesome-report/* || true && npm run triggerAllTests-headless && npm run mochawesome-merge
scripts.cypress-multi-browser: npm run triggerAllTests-autostore -- --browser electron --headed & npm run triggerAllTests-autostore -- --browser chrome --headed
